<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get IPFIX Filter Context (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/ipfixfiltercontexts/{context_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List an IPFIX filter context.
